title: Enhancing Data Science Practical Competencies: Extended Project-Based Learning to Promote Self-Directed Independent Learning

context.prior_knowledge: Basic language proficiency and foundational communication skills in professional contexts
context.additional_context: Advanced AI/machine learning technical course for AI/ML practitioners

learning_goals: Learners can complete one self-directed language project (e.g., medical/legal/technical case analysis reports) using the EPQ framework within 6 months
Learners can explore project topics and collect/analyze digital resources for ≥5 hours weekly using autonomous learning modules in the LMS
Learners can exchange and incorporate feedback three or more times on interim project deliverables through a peer feedback system

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
